line_1: Will heighten or lessen the falling cascade,
line_2: For Fancy, that fairy, will darken the glade,

line_1: Or pours the Waters o'er the steep Cascade;
line_2: Now forms the verdant Walk, or sunny Glade,

line_1: Of the grot, and the silver cascade,
line_2: The bow'r which for Delia he made,

line_1: And sooths the dashing of his rough cascade.
line_2: Soft music breathes along each op'ning shade,

line_1: Far from the uproar of the loud cascade,
line_2: Where the slow stream crept softly to the shade,

line_1: Where the soft murmurs of a low cascade
line_2: Might join the stream that gurgl'd through the glade;
